name: Polycheck
description:
An Original Board game I made. It's a combination of checkers and monopoly. 

How to play

  • Roll a dice to get a move amount.
  • move a player piece to desired grid with arrow keys, WASD or touch screen. 
  • buy a property (moves don't deducted when buy a property) by space key or touch screen.
  • Try to get opponent player land on your property grid and get paid.
  • If you land on opponent's property, player can buy their property and become your own.
  • Try to make opponent runs out of credits then you'll win.
  • But if your credits are below 0, you'll lose

Currently can play on 2 players with human. It's playable on mobile through web browser.

Have fun :)
